text: Maciej Twarowski (born 13 March 2001), is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a forward for Jagiellonia Białystok.http://www.90minut.pl/kariera.php?id=35082 ==Career== On 8 August 2019, Twarowski was loaned out to Olimpia Grudziądz from Jagiellonia Białystok for the rest of 2019.MACIEJ TWAROWSKI W OLIMPII GRUDZIĄDZ!, olimpiagrudziadz.com, 8 August 2019Ivan Očenáš i Maciej Twarowski odeszli z Olimpii Grudziądz, grudziadz.naszemiasto.pl, 30 December 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Jagiellonia Białystok players Category:Olimpia Grudziądz players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:I liga players
title: Maciej Twarowski
